Params: {3: 'Under the blinding sunlight from the church entrance, a mysterious female figure with an ashen head of hair steps forth.'}
{3: 'In an instant, electricity—of a ghostly red—arced around her.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "No... This is... high-density Punishing Virus reactions! She's a Corrupted!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I... can't discern her appearance... There are errors in my visual signals and... my thoughts... are muddled...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Wait... Lucia's M.I.N.D. stability is dropping! And it's not due to the Punishing Virus! What's happening?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: 'The error, the fault, must end here...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She unhurriedly stepped toward Lucia, all the while unsheathing a crimson blade from her waist.'}
